Colour Copying

We offer a colour copying service with a speed of up to 51 pages per minute (ppm). We have standard sizes such as A4 and A3 but can print on any size up to an SRA3, with single-sided or double-sided as an option. Our standard copier paper is 100gsm Colortech which is at the top end of paper quality, but this is also offer in 160gsm, 250gsm and 350gsm.

Print

  • Colour Copying

    We offer a colour copying service with a speed of up to 51 pages per minute (ppm).

    We have standard sizes such as A4 and A3 but can print on any size up to an SRA3, with single-sided or double-sided as an option. Our standard copier paper is 100gsm Colortech which is at the top end of paper quality, but this is also offer in 160gsm, 250gsm and 350gsm.

    Quote
  • Black & White Copying

    We offer a document copying service for black and white documents, with a speed of up to 80 pages per minute (ppm). We have standard sizes such as A4 and A3 but can print on any size up to an SRA3, with single-sided or double-sided as an option. Our standard copier paper is 100gsm Colortech which is at the top end of paper quality.

    Quote
